tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: 2.5 hours of dental procedure involving one root canal and 3 dental filings. Throughout, the doctor and her accomplice were consistent. The doctor patiently explained the entire procedure in the beginning and also during the procedure. She gave me heads up if I'm supposed to expect a pain jerk for the moment. This was critical for me, i could thus relax rest of the times üòÄ. She was as meticulous even towards the end when she had to refine the filling for letting me have my jaw bite natural. Finally she was considerate also of my timeline in giving me her next appointment.

Visited for dental crown. Cap is coming out from teeth again and again after treatment. When i called her about this she said will charge again 500 for checking although its not even a month after treatment. How can u charge fee again  if your treatment goes wrong its your fault. Highly expensive, highly disappointed.
reply_text: Really sorry to know your experience . But just for you to note , as per what you told us, the Crown came out once which ideally you should have come and shown us once but you didn‚Äôt and you rather chose to wear the loose crown on the tooth which is an incorrect practice. Crown usually comes off only if there is a slight high point on it which a patient realises only once he starts biting from that side, on examination if we find the high point, we reduce it and re fix  the same. It‚Äôs not the treatment that went wrong, it‚Äôs your perception that is making you feel so. As far as the fee is concerned, we haven‚Äôt charged you any repeat fee yet. Still suggest you come and show it once if possible. We will re fix it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had severe pain in my tooth and after researching in Google found Dr Suhani(looking at the good reviews). she is the very first dentist whom I was visiting here in Mumbai. She was friendly and after examining my tooth, she said tht I have to undergo a root canal and she even gave me time to think about it. I was sceptical since my husband had not so pleasant experiences with 3 dentists here. I had no other choice than listening to her since my pain was getting worsened. I was totally nervous and she could see that from my face. But the way she counseled me had such an impact on me that I totally trusted her and surrounded myself to her. My threshold to pain is minimal, but she handled me with great patience and even consoled me. She followed up about my tooth after each sitting (even when she was on vacation). She even gave proper guidance as to how to take care of my tooth post root canal. She is available anytime of the day or night and gives quick response to patients' query. She is honest and gives proper calculations about her charges without any hidden costs. I never got any family dentist here in Mumbai, but now I have her as one. Even my husband is planning to visit her for his wisdom tooth case (it's been months together that he found out the problem but never got a trusted dentist to operate it). We are glad that we found her.
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking out time and reviewing us. We really appreciate the cooperation showed by you during the entire course of the treatment. Patient‚Äôs satisfaction has always been our prime focus and such kind words from our patients is something what keeps us going. Looking forward to serve you for all your dental needs in future as wellüòäüôèüèª

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I visited the clinic for toothache and the  doctor was patient and explained the problem well and the overall treatment was good.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The tooth extraction procedure went seamlessly. The clinic's state-of-the-art facilities and modern equipment were indicative of their commitment to excellence. What truly sets Dr. Suhani apart is their extraordinary skill and precision. The extraction itself was practically painless and remarkably efficient. Dr. Suhani's ability to navigate the complexities of wisdom tooth extraction with such finesse left me genuinely impressed.
Furthermore, the post-operative care and guidance I received were invaluable.
The follow-up from the Dr. post-surgery also shows her genuine concern for the patients she treats.

Dr Suhani gave me a very beautiful experience of life. She is intelligent, polite and professional. She is an expert is her field within minutes she explained me the treatment and completed it successfully. Earlier for one the tooth the other doctor was giving me wrong details, but Dr Suhani without creating any background treated it fully there and then. Everything was so normal for her but I was astonished as I was told that this is time consuming treatment. I am sure that the way she is working, within few years she will be a well known or a leading name of the town or country.
I strongly recommend her and will visit her again whenever required.üå∫‚≠êÔ∏èü•Ç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mom had 2 root canals done with Dr. Suhani. She was very friendly and explained the issue in depth. My mom was nervous about the whole procedure but Dr. Suhani made her feel comfortable and made sure she was on the same page. 

Even though both the root canals were done correctly, my mom still felt some lingering pain, a year after the procedure. When we visited again after a year with this issue, Dr. Suhani promptly agreed to re-do both the root canals free of cost. Had we gone to any other dentist they would have charged us a hefty amount for both the root canals. 

Both the root canals were successful and my mom is free from any pain. Dr. Suhani was very welcoming and it showed that patient satisfaction was her top priority.

Oh and she's got a great playlist that she puts on during procedure! 
Highly recommended !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Suhani for swelling due to wisdom tooth, root canal treatment and teeth cleaning. I have visited various dentists for dental issues in the past but so far, she has been far most the most amazing dentist I've come across. I had a bad swelling due to my wisdom tooth and she gave the best solutions and treatment. My root canal treatment went really smoothly as well. I highly recommend her. Going to the dentist has always been a nightmare to me but not anymore! Thank you so much Dr. Suhani for being so warm and patient throughout the treatment. I really enjoy and love the style of your treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

It seems like the clinic is run by a single big family, always smiling and welcoming everyone with love and care, under the guidance of Dr. Suhani. Thank you, and hope you keep serving the community with your genuine efforts to improve one‚Äôs lifestyle. All the best to each and every member of this wonderful

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been dealing with my wisdom toothache from past one month and other providers advise me to go under oral surgery to get it removed. Due to fear I didn't went for any treatment further but after seeing positive reviews on practo app for Dr. Suhani I thought of giving another chance. 1). She made me realise how not to depend on Google but consult with the doctor first. 2) She explained me in detail about the pre and post session  procedure about the extraction. 3)  Extraction done without any pain. 4) Dr. Suhani is very nice and informative. 5) Thank you so much for the excellent dental care and I will be coming here for all my future dental problems üòÅ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We visited Dr. Suhani for the Root Canal Treatment of my mother as well as my father in July 2021. Overall we had a very good experience with her. To elaborate further - 

1. Dr. Suhani is very friendly *** ************** She explains the issue in detail. This helps the patient to relax and be assured. She even played some light music to calm down my mother who was afraid of pain! 

2. Covid norms were duly followed. Both the doctor and her assistant were wearing masks, gloves and PPE kits. 

3. The clinic was clean and well maintained. 

The RCT was successful and both my parents are now free of tooth pain. Treatment cost was very reasonable.

 We would highly recommend Dr. Suhani to anyone who is facing any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I consulted Dr. Suhani for a persisting issue with one of my molars. Turned out that I needed an RCT.
The doctor put me at ease and explained the entire process beforehand. *** ** **** ************* extremely thorough and brings the ‚Äòartistic‚Äô element into her treatment.
Never felt the slightest of discomfort throughout the three seatings. 
While a week ago I was experiencing excruciating pain, I am so relieved and happy now to be able to have a mouthful without any worry, pain or discomfort whatsoever.
Glad to have consulted her. Will recommend her wholeheartedly and rate her treatment 10/10 on all aspects.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am actually scared of going to dentist place as i have suffered a lot when i was in different city.I went to Dr Suhani today and my experience of being there was really nice and great üëç.I got my teeth extraction  as recommended by Dr Suhani, as it was fully damagedIt went really smooth and wasn't really painful.I am planning to get treatment for few more teeths sooner or later. Yes it's a viscous circle ‚≠ïüòä.Patient cooperation is always required to get rid of any medical issue in a  timely manner.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Clinic was clean well maintained with covid protocol 
Doctor was soft spoken explained details clearly and got my Wisdom tooth extracted Which was shaking and also told me about the gum infection on my lower bridge and advised me to get it re conditioned or replaced since the teeth holding the bridge may need root canal or new fillings , she also took the trouble of explaining what processes are available , either drill through the present bridge and get the root canal done and patch it up or replace it with new Bridge to avoid further gum infection which I normally get when I bite hard food etc

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited the clinic for fixing crown on root canal which was done earlier and also to remove the cavity from other molars. I found the practices of Dr Suhani very professional and commendable. 

During the procedure she was very attentive to the pain it caused while removing the cavity. There was considerable effort taken by her to ensure the procedure can be completed with minimum to no discomfort to the patient. 

I would highly rate the services rendered by Dr Suhani and would recommend others who have dental requirements.

Best,

Bharatt
